description: This file describes the format of a handlebars-test specification

description.description: A description of what should be tested in this file

template.description: The original template that should be compiled

ast.description: The AST that is expected to be returned by the parser

additionalProperties.description: The filename of the helper inside the 'language-specific' directory

failsInOriginalHandlebars.description: Indicates that this test fails in the original Handlebars (4.x), but in my opinion this should be correct
